section.title: GetChangedZonesBatch Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Fetches a list of all changed zones for a nameserver, but limit response to a number of changes.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: [changes|changes Datatype - Atomia DNS API] GetChangedZonesBatch( string nameserver, int num )

tr.td: the servername to fetch changes for
the maximum number of changes to return
